data.text:
It was such a nice place to have a holiday break. The ambiance and features are so good. To rest the mind and enjoy the weekend one of the best in international city. Break busy days and good place to rest.
Appreciate Ms, Ei & Hanshu for the service.
data.title: BEST OUT OF BEST

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Amalsu2516IH,
Thank you for staying at Ibis styles dragon mart.
We very much appreciate your positive feedback, and glad that you were amazed by the hotel and service of the staff specially Ei and Hanshu  whom you personally mentioned in the review.
It will be our pleasure to welcome you again in the near future.
Sincerely,
Amr Eldiba , Asst. Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Aihleen Galang

data.text: Ibis dragon mart hotel is very nice and great hotel to visit. Reception staff and restaurant staff is very friendly and kindly staff. Specially prasol in the restaurant he is very friendly. Thank you for the hospitality you give us.ðŸŒ¸ðŸŒ¸ðŸŒ¸ðŸŒ¸ðŸŒ¸ðŸŒ¸ðŸŒ¸ðŸŒ¸
data.title: Nice holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Crishanij,
Thank you for choosing Ibis styles dragon mart to stay, and for taking your time to write this review.
I am delighted to know that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Our amazing guests deserve the best and we are striving to offer outstanding services. Your kind words will be definitely shared with the team especially to Prasol from restaurant team and reception staff whom you have personally mentioned.
Thank you once again and we are looking forward to welcome you back soon.
Sincerely,
Amr Eldiba , Asst. Front Office manager
owner_response.author: Aihleen Galang

data.text: It was a wonderful evening on 16 th march when I had a birthday party at The market restaurant in Ibis hotel Dragon mart, staffs were amazing and especially Mr. Nidhin (F&B Manager) who was supported me from the day I confirmed the booking and throughout the party day. I would like to thank Mr. Prazol, Rakesh as well. Really I was happy and my family and friends as well, well done team much appreciated.
data.title: My son birthday party went well with Ibis team

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sumeshs,

Thank you for choosing to celebrate your birthday with us at The Market restaurant in Ibis Styles Dragon Mart. We're thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful evening and that our staff, especially Nidhin, Prazol, and Rakesh, contributed to making your celebration memorable.

We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to our team members. It's always a pleasure to receive such positive feedback, and we're delighted that we could exceed your expectations.

We look forward to welcoming you back for more memorable experiences in the future.

Warm regards,
Sabry AL Bittar
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Aihleen Galang

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and found our service exceptional.

We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to Rakesh. We're proud to have him on our team, and it's wonderful to hear that he made your stay memorable with his helpful and friendly demeanor.

We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another enjoyable stay.

Warm regards,
Sabry Al Bittar
Front Office manager
owner_response.author: Aihleen Galang

data.text: Hey hey fellow travellers! Should admit that overall place is clean and friendly. Some minor issues with laundry schedule only - so check their timing in advance. Many thanks for Pyazol and rest of hotel dining team for their hospitalityðŸ™‚
data.title: Just great

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear T8311V,

First of all, we would like to express our sincerest gratitude for your trust and for choosing our wonderful hotel, Ibis styles dragon mart for your stay in Dubai.

It is indeed a great source of satisfaction to read that you had a pleasant stay with us.

I am truly happy to know that we have managed to exceed your expectations in regards to hospitality and service delivered and will not fail to pass your comments to Pyazol whom you have personally mentioned.

Again we thank you for this wonderful review, it has been a pleasure for us to read and we look forward to serving you again soon.

Sincerely,
Amr Eldiba , Asst. Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Aihleen Galang
